msbt.message: Aren't you quite the explorer! That shovel you were holding comes in handy, doesn't it? You aren't the only one who knows their way around a shovel. I myself dig for hot springs on occasion. I can't say I've had much success, but I'll keep trying. The effort is worth the free spa day, .
Why, look at you with your watering can. Your green thumb is showing!
Why , bravo! That umbrella is the perfect accessory to your outfit. I am quite impressed by your bold fashion choice, . And you know I'm not easily impressed.
Was that an axe you had just now?Be sure to handle that with care, , and more importantly, watch out for wasp nests!

What on earth are you doing with that? Are you using it for good, or are you up to no good? I don't tend to trust anyone holding a slingshotbut you seem reasonable, so I'll make an exception this time. Now, a bit of advice, Make sure whatever you're shooting at doesn't fall into the water.
Well, well, look at what you have. Aren't we fancy.Master that wand and you'll be ready for any occasion!
My, my! You do seem to keep yourself busy. Building a road is quite the commitment! You seem to have an eye for urban design. I'm looking forward to taking a stroll on our new walking path!

Every famous island needs a cliff, so I'm glad you're taking the initiative.Do me a favor, though Make sure your cliffs are clearly marked.Some folks don't look where they're going, and, well, I think you get the idea here.
Making a new river, are we? Why, that's lovely! Waterways add so much to our island's natural beauty. It's quite a big job, , but I trust your handiwork will be just splendid.
Sowhat are you celebrating, ? You can't fool me! I see that party popper of yours. I swear, if you pull the string near me without warning, you WILL regret it, .
Why, don't you look handy carrying around that ladder of yours.Do be careful going up and down those cliffs, you hear? We wouldn't want any accidents, .
You can jump over rivers with that vaulting pole, yes?It does seem like a convenient way to get around, butit's much too scary for me to try, .

Oh, that net looks like it's barely been used! You must be new to bug hunting, huh? I haven't caught bugs since I was a little girl, but I do remember a few best practices. Remember to always approach ever so quietly! Tiptoe toward bugs if you must. Otherwise, they'll fly away. Good luck out there, !
Isn't it just the best feeling when you catch a bug you've never seen before? I'm also on a quest to find the most exotic-looking bugs on the island. We'll see how it goes, !
Well, well! It looks like you're getting the hang of this bug-catching thing!It takes time to master the finer points of bug catching, but it seems like you're well on your way!
Oh, ! I've been meaning to chat with you. I could use a few bug-catching pointers. Well, unless your advice is "Practice makes perfect." I already knew that, .
I heard a rumor about you, Is it true you finished catching every single bug?! I had no idea I was in the presence of a fellow completionist! Congrats!

You look like you're ready to make a big splash with that little fishing rod.What kind of fish are you after? Big ones? Small ones? Rare ones? There are SO many fish to fish for! Oh dear, now I want to go fishing too, !

Don't be discouraged if the fish aren't biting. Sometimes it's just a matter of location. You need to keep moving around until you spot a shadow in the water. Fishing requires true perseverance! And a surprising amount of walking, so don't forget to wear comfortable shoes, !
I know fishing can be boring, but your biggest catches will certainly be worth the wait! Plus, if no one is looking, you can sneak in a fun little victory dance!
My, my, ! You've caught so many fish that I'm starting to think you can speak to them. Is that your secret to luring your greatest catches? If so, you'll have to teach me, !
I heard the news! You've seen every single type of fish now, haven't you?Why didn't you just tell me?! You're far too modest. C'mon, now! You've earned your bragging rights.
It looks as if the sky is interested in watering the plants as well.Though if I were a plant, I think I'd prefer to get a personalized watering from you, .
Seeing how you're making sure to water the plants, even on a snowy day like today I'm sure the plants are as impressed by your green thumb as I am, .
I'm sure the plants you're watering would tell you "thank you" if they could, .
